description: Lists all Recovery Snapshots for a single Source Server.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: A set of filters by which to return Recovery Snapshots. fromDateTime (string) --- The start date in a date range query. toDateTime (string) --- The end date in a date range query.

nested_params.name: fromDateTime
nested_params.description: The start date in a date range query.

nested_params.name: toDateTime
nested_params.description: The end date in a date range query.

parameters.name: sourceServerID
parameters.description: Filter Recovery Snapshots by Source Server ID.

nested_items.name: expectedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when we expect the snapshot to be taken.

nested_items.name: snapshotID
nested_items.description: The ID of the Recovery Snapshot.

nested_items.name: sourceServerID
nested_items.description: The ID of the Source Server that the snapshot was taken for.

nested_items.name: timestamp
nested_items.description: The actual timestamp that the snapshot was taken.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token of the next Recovery Snapshot to retrieve.
